biotools.summary:
Direct access to raw mass spectrometry data in R.

R interface for Thermo Fisher Scientifc raw files branched from rawDiag. This package wraps the functionality of the RawFileReader .NET assembly. Within the R environment spectra and chromatograms are represented by S3 objects. All objects are currently kept in memory. Later versions will support on-disc backend processing and lazy evaluation.

Please install the latest release from https://github.com/fgcz/rawR/releases according to the provided instructions.
